Description: Please READ entire ad, see pics for condition, and ask ALL questions BEFORE purchase! Thanks! For sale here is my fantastic 2003 Schecter Diamond Series Hellcat guitar with a sleek Ivory Pearl finish. The Hellcat is a departure from Schecter's usual shred oriented guitars with appointments more friendly to less aggressive players. It features an alder body, maple neck, 22 fret rosewood board, 25.5" scale, locking TonePros bridge with string-thru body, Grover tuners, 3 Duncan Designed MH-102 Mini Humbucker pickups and master volume and tone controls with a 5 way switch and a coil tap. My guitar is in great shape with a few smaller dings and scratches; nothing major at all. No case. Please don't hesitate to ask any and all questions that you may have or for more pictures BEFORE you buy and I will get back to you immediately. There are absolutely no refunds on this guitar, so please be sure of your purchase before you Buy Now or make an offer. Guitar will be shipped fully insured and packed like a beast. Thanks for reading and good luck! *****For my international customers: I ship almost anywhere in the world! Because this guitar contains rosewood, it is subject to strict CITES regulations for export. I am Colorado's only private CITES certified seller! CITES paperwork can take up to 30 days for approval BEFORE the item can ship. Buyer is responsible for all shipping, customs, and CITES associated fees. PLEASE CONTACT ME PRIOR TO MAKING AN OFFER OR BUYING.
